topic.title: Photoshop contest
topic.body:
“If someone wants to have their photo taken with Hassan Rouhani, it’s not possible; it’s possible to do it with Photoshop,” the Iranian president said in an apparent reference to the idea of meeting with Trump.

Please do something with photoshop and Rouhani. 
I pledge 10 USD to the winner, the one who get more upvotes.

topic.title: deepfakes are finally brought to the masses, thoughts?
topic.body:
ZAO app is apparently doing this https://www.theverge.com/2019/9/2/20844338/zao-deepfake-app-movie-tv-show-face-replace-privacy-policy-concerns

how will this impact the planet?

imho: 
a good impact will be that the internet - mainly ig and fb - will stop beeing used as a signalling system https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Signalling_theory (showing photos of you in the mountain, or the fancy bar, etc.) and will gradually return to the original idea of microblogging, so i see a really good outcome for this. 
on the news side also, because principle of authority will be deadly wounded and so "news corps" will have an harder time getting the trust they need to survive.

1566461918_112M71AbhUCyq3M7k8PLDRdELuQKG.body:
> [moneybadger](#comment_2_15dh9yJTSgewL53B9uMW7TTkJF7wHp1tge): yea it was that fukin mossad isralie "art" group gelatin that had full access to the floor that were hit a couple of weeks prior to the attack and were seen bringing in many boxes of fuse holders along some other suspicious activities. they are still around today and in 2005 have changed their name to "gelitin" and have relocated to  zionist hq  vienna austria. their website is gelitin.net. they are a group of 4 artist

sure, i trust you, give me no references

> [moneybadger](#comment_3_15dh9yJTSgewL53B9uMW7TTkJF7wHp1tge): what you want me to breathe for you also? I'm just giving you a bread crumb, find the way yourself

if you don't think is the case to be kind with others you don't know how can you really argue flying planes into them is wrong? (anyway if you are into this kind of shit look also for 5 minutes at the image here https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Sphere and then look again at the fight club movie)

1566815498_1MgPQAFQwHMiHTouXfUiS98cHrnyL.body: define "political", if it's political has to do with money, that's the short answer

1566876896_17bfQv5PQW9FZ4akChr7ECfqP2SKu.body: you can start it time by time with the parameter `--size_limit`, or just change this line https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/blob/py3/src/Config.py#L238

1567013011_1JM6gfdXN5wnxLR2LmUuvx4216mtP.body:
> [mg0](#comment_121_1LbP2cNA6NkvuFJvs7McUmv9qGjkNqVkTa): Note that some books will only be available thru the TOR mirror of the site, so mind using the Tor browser bundle.

source? I never notice this (or example)

> [mg0](#comment_122_1LbP2cNA6NkvuFJvs7McUmv9qGjkNqVkTa): ok, I tried looking for all the books I used to look for before, none are showing me the same banner as before but I'm sure it happened. by that time it didn't go by the name Z-library afaik, it was just b-ok and some books said that because of DCMA notices they had to disallow the download on the clearnet site and suggested to try the onion address of the site, in which the downloads were working.

well very peculiar, if it happens again just out of curiosity pls send me a zmail XD

1566679861_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2.body:
> [hostfat](#comment_3_17ezFE1pdnXf9sFsoGvzZqxsZhX6DiQg4J): As I understand, this can happen everywhere, even on clearnet websites. [...]

to avoid this you will simply need to add an option to disallow thumbnail download no big deal, it will be surely added.

what does it changes exactly having an extra hole on this matter? can you explain?
